abstract: Speculation is rife over whether Pres-elect Donald J Trump will continue conciliatory tone of his victory speech or fulfill his campaign pledge to re-open investigation into Hillary Clinton's handling of emails; Obama administration has not indicated it will grant her clemency; voices from both sides emphasize importance of country moving forward.

headline.print_headline: Trump Camp Refuses to Close Door on Campaign Pledge to ‘Lock Her Up’
headline.main: Trump Camp Refuses to Close Door on Campaign Pledge to ‘Lock Her Up’

snippet: A decision on whether to further investigate Hillary Clinton will indicate whether Donald Trump intends to look ahead or look back and settle political scores....
lead_paragraph: A decision on whether to further investigate Hillary Clinton will indicate whether Donald Trump intends to look ahead or look back and settle political scores.
